Welcome to RoomieMatch

RoomieMatch is a Tinder-style college roommate matching app designed to help students find their ideal roommates through a simple, swipe-based interface. Whether you're looking for someone who shares your sleep schedule, study habits, or favorite Netflix shows, RoomieMatch makes the search easy and intuitive. Users create detailed profiles highlighting lifestyle preferences, cleanliness, noise tolerance, and more‚Äîthen swipe left or right to connect with potential roommates who match their vibe. Say goodbye to awkward room assignments and hello to living with someone you actually get along with.

We would love to show you an example to help you set up your account!!!
